comments.body: Can you do this during the build to avoid the need to do it after installation? Or is the result dependent on what other plugins are installed?

Hi @chrisburr actually the called top-level ``verdi`` command is part of another package (i.e. ``aiida-core``) and only works if the commands exposed by the ``aiida-cusp`` package are discovered correctly by running the ``reentry scan``command after the plugin has been installed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@    - aiida_cusp.utils
  commands:
    - reentry scan -r aiida
    - verdi data potcar --help
